name: coffee-roaster_get_all_beans
description:
Get all coffee beans in the catalog.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of beans to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of all coffee beans sorted by rating

name: coffee-roaster_get_bean_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific coffee bean.

Args:
    bean_id: The unique ID of the bean

Returns:
    Bean details including origin, flavor notes, and pricing

name: coffee-roaster_search_beans
description:
Search coffee beans with flexible filters.

Args:
    query: Search term (matches name, description, flavor notes)
    origin_country: Filter by origin country (e.g., 'Ethiopia', 'Colombia')
    roast_level: Filter by roast level ('Light', 'Medium', 'Medium-Dark', 'Dark')
    process: Filter by processing method ('Washed', 'Natural', 'Honey')
    min_price: Minimum price for 12oz bag
    max_price: Maximum price for 12oz bag
    is_single_origin: Filter single origin beans only
    is_organic: Filter organic certified beans
    is_fair_trade: Filter fair trade certified beans
    flavor_note: Search for specific flavor note (e.g., 'chocolate', 'fruity')
    in_stock_only: Only show beans in stock
    sort_by: Sort field (rating, price_12oz, name, reviews_count)
    limit: Maximum results (default 30)

Returns:
    List of matching coffee beans

name: coffee-roaster_get_beans_by_origin
description:
Get coffee beans from a specific origin country.

Args:
    country: Origin country (e.g., 'Ethiopia', 'Colombia', 'Kenya')
    limit: Maximum results (default 30)

Returns:
    List of beans from the specified origin

name: coffee-roaster_get_beans_by_roast_level
description:
Get coffee beans by roast level.

Args:
    roast_level: Roast level ('Light', 'Medium', 'Medium-Dark', 'Dark')
    limit: Maximum results (default 30)

Returns:
    List of beans with the specified roast level

name: coffee-roaster_get_single_origins
description:
Get all single origin coffee beans.

Args:
    limit: Maximum results (default 30)

Returns:
    List of single origin beans

name: coffee-roaster_get_featured_beans
description:
Get featured/staff pick coffee beans.

Args:
    limit: Number of featured beans (default 5)

Returns:
    List of top-rated featured beans

name: coffee-roaster_get_origins
description:
Get all available coffee origin countries.

Returns:
    List of origin countries

name: coffee-roaster_get_roast_levels
description:
Get all available roast levels.

Returns:
    List of roast levels

name: coffee-roaster_get_processing_methods
description:
Get all available coffee processing methods.

Returns:
    List of processing methods (Washed, Natural, Honey, etc.)

name: coffee-roaster_get_subscription_plans
description:
Get all available coffee subscription plans.

Returns:
    List of subscription plans with pricing and features

name: coffee-roaster_get_subscription_plan
description:
Get details for a specific subscription plan.

Args:
    plan_id: The ID of the subscription plan

Returns:
    Plan details including frequency, pricing, and features

name: coffee-roaster_subscribe
description:
Subscribe to a coffee subscription plan.

Args:
    plan_id: The ID of the subscription plan
    bean_id: Optional specific bean to subscribe to (for fixed selection plans)
    roast_preference: Preferred roast level ('Light', 'Medium', 'Medium-Dark', 'Dark')
    grind_type: Grind type ('Whole Bean', 'Drip', 'Espresso', 'French Press', 'Pour Over')

Returns:
    Subscription confirmation with details

name: coffee-roaster_get_my_subscriptions
description:
Get current user's active subscriptions.

Returns:
    List of user's subscriptions with status and next shipment date

name: coffee-roaster_cancel_subscription
description:
Cancel a subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The ID of the subscription to cancel

Returns:
    Cancellation confirmation

name: coffee-roaster_pause_subscription
description:
Pause a subscription temporarily.

Args:
    subscription_id: The ID of the subscription to pause

Returns:
    Pause confirmation

name: coffee-roaster_resume_subscription
description:
Resume a paused subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The ID of the subscription to resume

Returns:
    Resume confirmation with next shipment date

name: coffee-roaster_get_brewing_guides
description:
Get all available brewing guides.

Returns:
    List of brewing guides for different methods

name: coffee-roaster_get_brewing_guide
description:
Get a specific brewing guide by ID.

Args:
    guide_id: The ID of the brewing guide

Returns:
    Detailed brewing guide with steps and tips

name: coffee-roaster_get_brewing_guide_by_method
description:
Get a brewing guide for a specific method.

Args:
    method: Brewing method (e.g., 'Pour Over', 'French Press', 'Espresso')

Returns:
    Brewing guide for the specified method

name: coffee-roaster_get_brewing_methods
description:
Get all available brewing methods.

Returns:
    List of brewing methods with guides available

name: coffee-roaster_add_to_cart
description:
Add a coffee bean to the shopping cart.

Args:
    bean_id: The ID of the bean to add
    quantity: Number of bags to add (default 1)
    bag_size: Size of bag ('12oz', '2lb', '5lb')
    grind_type: Grind preference ('Whole Bean', 'Drip', 'Espresso', 'French Press', 'Pour Over')

Returns:
    Cart update confirmation with totals

name: coffee-roaster_get_cart
description:
Get the current shopping cart contents.

Returns:
    Cart items with details and totals

name: coffee-roaster_update_cart_item
description:
Update the quantity of an item in the cart.

Args:
    cart_id: The cart item ID
    quantity: New quantity (0 to remove)

Returns:
    Updated cart totals

name: coffee-roaster_remove_from_cart
description:
Remove an item from the cart.

Args:
    cart_id: The cart item ID to remove

Returns:
    Removal confirmation

name: coffee-roaster_clear_cart
description:
Clear all items from the shopping cart.

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: coffee-roaster_checkout
description:
Checkout and place an order for all items in the cart.

Returns:
    Order confirmation with order IDs

name: coffee-roaster_get_order_history
description:
Get the current user's order history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum orders to return (default 20)

Returns:
    List of past orders

name: coffee-roaster_get_order
description:
Get details for a specific order.

Args:
    order_id: The order ID

Returns:
    Order details

name: coffee-roaster_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in user's profile.

Returns:
    User profile with preferences
